meanings.definition: A man who works for wages.
meanings.sent1: The workingman received his paycheck at the end of the week.
meanings.sent2: The workingman clocked in at the factory every morning.
meanings.sent3: The workingman joked that his wallet was always hungry for more money.
meanings.sent4: The workingman was the backbone of the company, keeping things running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The workingman's dedication to his job was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: A man who is employed in manual or industrial labor.
meanings.sent1: The workingman lifted heavy boxes all day at the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The workingman's hands were calloused from hard work.
meanings.sent3: The workingman pretended to be a superhero, lifting imaginary weights.
meanings.sent4: The workingman was a machine, never tiring in his physical tasks.
meanings.sent5: The workingman's sweat and toil built the foundation of the city.
